ing: 1/2 cup finely diced red bell pepper
1/2 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
des: "I've always loved the marvelous contrast between a hot, smoky piece of meat, and a cold, fruity salsa; and this version featuring nectarines did not disappoint. In fact, the only thing that pairs better with this fresh fruit salsa is a basket of crispy tortilla chips."
ins:
Combine nectarines, bell pepper, onions, jalapeno pepper, and cilantro in a bowl. Stir in lime juice, olive oil, salt, and cayenne pepper.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap. Refrigerate to let flavors develop, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
Before serving, stir in black pepper. Add a pinch more salt, if needed.
